name: Weather Pong
description:
Its a typical game of pong...
Except that sometimes the wind blows and completely changes the rotation of the pong table. Have fun trying to figure out moving the pong game.

Controls:
DESKTOP USERS: Just A & D to move.
MOBILE USERS: Just touch the Left & Right half planes.

(Its a proof of concept at this point. I hope to implement further on this as time goes on, but for now this is how it is at this point. Thanks for trying out a prototype that I quickly wrote up).

Made using the olc::PixelGameEngine & olc::SoundWaveEngine by javidx9.

Wind swoosh sound effect by Fesliyan Studios
All other sounds generated by JSFXR
